fields.name: Tome of Beasts
fields.desc: Tome of Beasts from Kobold Press brings more than 400 new monsters to the 5th Edition! Use them in your favorite setting for fantasy adventure! Pick up Tome of Beasts and give your players an encounter they wonâ€™t soon forget.
